title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; sync & async APIs for chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints for chat, completion, and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, managing models, multi-user, RAG, voice input.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and LangChain vector stores.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for no-code LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Community discussion on wiring Ollama models into Neovim via copilot.vim fork or custom plugin.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support, mod roles.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama HTTP API; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with nimble package.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, streaming.

title: Ollama Reddit launch thread
summary: High-traffic Reddit thread announcing Ollama 0.1; users share install tips, benchmarks, model requests.

title: Hacker News: Ollama 0.2 release
summary: HN discussion on Windows support, Docker images, and comparison to llama.cpp server mode.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list models with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that proxies to Ollama; shows streaming markdown, code highlighting, session memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings
summary: Rust demo repo benchmarking Ollama embeddings (nomic-embed-text) vs sentence-transformers on arc-teksts.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial early Go client for Ollama; provides generate, chat, and embedding endpoints with context support.
